lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers and economists in Bangkok said they expect at least seven pct growth this year in private sector construction as a result of government assistance, low mortgage rates and a generally bullish economic outlook.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "What we have seen is an increase in inquiries, particularly from Japan, but this has yet to show itself in many new deals being done," said Allan Farrar, executive director (real estate) of Elders IXL Ltd's pastoral group.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In contrast, Australia's easing of rules on foreign investment in property, combined with financial deregulation and a weaker dollar, has helped spark overseas interest in the market, analysts said.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "What we have seen is an increase in inquiries, particularly from Japan, but this has yet to show itself in many new deals being done," said Allan Farrar, executive director (real estate) of Elders IXL Ltd's pastoral group.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In contrast, Australia's easing of rules on foreign investment in property, combined with financial deregulation and a weaker dollar, has helped spark overseas interest in the market, analysts said.
